title: Parse Options
description:
Parse options can be used to configure how Marko's parser should parse a tag.

These options set in the [parseOptions](./tag.definitions.yaml) property of a [tag definition](./tag.definitions.yaml)

import.description: Specifies a module to import when the tag is parsed, which can initialize state or register global behaviors.

text.description: When true, text nodes within the tag are preserved exactly as written, including whitespace characters.

statement.description: Marks the tag as containing a statement, which may influence how its content is evaluated or executed.

openTagOnly.description: Determines if the tag should only have an opening tag without a matching closing tag.

preserveWhitespace.description: Determines whether whitespace is preserved in the tag's output. Useful for tags where spacing is significant.

rawOpenTag.description: Allows the tag to be self-closing or to omit its closing tag in the markup.
